name: Scot Free
description:
Hi all, this is our submission for the 2021 What-A-Jam which provided us with the theme - Shortcut. While distracting your peers and copying their notes, get away scot free with a good mark! 

Walk around with WASD. Interact with E. Use the mouse during minigames.

On the off chance that the game freezes during the playthrough or you want to quit, Press ESC at anytime to switch to the next scene. 

Ciaran - Programming, Level Design, Audio / SFX

Teri - Programming, Art, Level Design

Rob - Programming, Level Design

Ola - Art

Assets used:

SD Auto Pilot Font by Sam Derrick

Menu Theme: Big Boss Hélice by Komiku

Classroom Theme: Opening! by Komiku
